meanings.definition: Involving three or more parties or countries.
meanings.sent1: The multilateralism agreement was signed by several nations.
meanings.sent2: The multilateralism approach to negotiations includes multiple countries.
meanings.sent3: The party was a multilateralism event with guests from various countries.
meanings.sent4: The multilateralism effort brought together nations like puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The concept of multilateralism means working together with many countries.

meanings.definition: The principle of participation by all members in a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: Global multilateralism promotes collaboration among all members.
meanings.sent2: The success of the organization relies on multilateralism.
meanings.sent3: At the meeting, everyone embraced multilateralism with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: Multilateralism is the key to unlocking collective potential.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of multilateralism lies in its inclusivity and unity.
